0:
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "uid"
  replacement = ""
}
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "pod"
  replacement = "$1"
}
1:
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "uid"
  replacement = ""
}
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "pod"
  replacement = "$1"
}

0:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1
1:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
